content.question: Which of the following is a disadvantage of using nuclear energy as a source of electricity?

choices.label: Energy production is not consistent from day to day.
Cooling towers release contaminants into the atmosphere.
Spent fuel rods must be disposed of properly.
Volatile organic compounds are released into groundwater.

content.answer: Spent fuel rods must be disposed of properly.

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Describe disadvantages, advantages, or unintended consequences for potential solutions.
